8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Hello. How sync between user's data.json and database works?

okey, so users can edit their data.json files, but what if somebody save incorrect data? For example I want to validate data, that user add. For example in currency transaction user can't transfer more money, than he has. How to check correctness of data?

1620574964_1C6gAPEiSgWRPes1bmpFhWcKGyyT2.body: When the war starts, most of the classic providers stop their work. Mesh networks and local networks will be good alternative for it. And of course zeronet over some mesh network like yggdrasil will be popular solution.
